content: how about a christmas wreath or a plaque to date your blanket this is an unusual afghan square featuring a circular laddering technique it may be used without the central overlaid motif as a place to add the date and initials to your blanket in true sampler style working in other colours will give a whole new look and adding a different central motif of your own will give a less seasonal block have fun playing with it my sample was stylecraft special dk with a 3 5 mm hook and measures 9 this was designed as the december square for 2023 crochet block a month cal /groups/2023-crochet-block-a-month-cal and tested by berniece jilly lynne and jo thank you all
